title: Salah Shokweir
text: Salah Shokweir (born 16 October 1929) is an Egyptian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%201960%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Lightweight">men's lightweight</a> event at the <a href="1960%20Summer%20Olympics">1960 Summer Olympics</a>.
